text: Rubem Azevedo Alves (September 15, 1933 – July 19, 2014) was a Brazilian theologian, philosopher, academic, writer and psychoanalyst. Alves was one of the founders of liberation theology. \- \- Alves was a Lutheran.Identifikation mit dem Anderen.
